gantrytips.tip: You can enable or disable the custom iPhone and iPod Touch automatic theme support.
You can enable or disable the custom Android automatic theme support.
You can enable or disable the zooming feature on your website when viewed via a supported mobile device.
Select a menu and the associated menu animation for the mobile theme.

You can enable the Images Resize setting which allows you to automatically have your website's images resized for iPhone viewers. Images that exceed the minimum width will be resized to the set percentage. Even with this option disabled, an autoresize of all the images bigger than the viewport is built-in.

Using the Color-chooser you can select two different colors to configure a gradient background which will be displayed in the Header position. These Gradients will be automatically generated thanks to the powerful CSS3 supported by the mobile device and a preview can be seen.

Using the Color-chooser you can select two different colors to configure a gradient background which will be displayed in the Showcase position. These Gradients will be automatically generated thanks to the powerful CSS3 supported by the mobile device and a preview can be seen.

Using the Color-chooser you can select two different colors to configure a gradient background which will be displayed in the Copyright position. These Gradients will be automatically generated thanks to the powerful CSS3 supported by the mobile device and a preview can be seen.
Allows to 'redirect' an mobile device custom position to a different one. Useful if you want to show some content you already have and don't want to update twice.
